tasks.label: Refresh api/swagger.yml
tasks.command: curl -sSf https://coinmanager.net/swagger.yml -o ${workspaceFolder}/lib/api/swagger.yml && echo '!!! Format the file to see the differences !!!'

tasks.label: Generate api clients
tasks.command: docker run --rm --volume ${workspaceFolder}/lib/api/generated:/src/lib --volume ${workspaceFolder}/lib/api/swagger.yml:/swagger.yml openapitools/openapi-generator-cli:v4.3.0 generate --generator-name dart-dio --input-spec /swagger.yml --output /src --additional-properties pubName=coin_manager/api/generated
